channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - release

item.title: Gentoo SELinux policy release script
item.description:
A few months ago, I wrote a small script that aids in the creation of new SELinux policy packages. The script is on the repository itself, in the gentoo/ subdirectory, and is called release-prepare.sh.

The reason for the script is that there are a number of steps to perform …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen

item.title: cvechecker 3.3 released
item.description: I just uploaded a new release of cvechecker to the project files. The release is a (long overdue) bugfix release, but includes two small enhancements: support standard input for the binary list (so you can pipe the output of one command to cvechecker) and the introduction of the CVECHECKER_CONFFILE variable …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen

item.title: New SELinux userspace release
item.description: A new release of the SELinux userspace utilities was recently announced. I have made the packages for Gentoo available and they should now be in the main tree (\~arch of course). During the testing of the packages however, I made a stupid mistake of running the tests on the wrong …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
